definitions.text: marked by qualities giving the power to produce an intended effect; -Aldous Huxley
examples: written propaganda is less efficacious than the habits and prejudices...of the readers
the medicine is efficacious in stopping a cough

definitions.text: producing or capable of producing an intended result or having a striking effect; -LewisMumford
examples: an air-cooled motor was more effective than a witch's broomstick for rapid long-distance transportation
his complaint proved to be effectual in bringing action
